Subject: Inform CDM Partners of AOBT in ACISP
Source Text: Procedures First step: To inform all relevant Airport CDM Partners of Actual Off-Block Time (AOBT) in the Airport CDM Platform and that the aircraft has commenced push-back / taxi from parking position.
